Name:
MV Argentina Maru
Kaiyō
Fate:
Sold to the Imperial Japanese Navy, 9 December 1942
Scrapped, 1 September 1946
Displacement:
13,600 t (13,400 long tons) (standard)
16,483 t (16,223 long tons) (loaded)
processing systems: 1 × Type 2, Mark 2, Model 1 air search radar
Armament:
4 × twin 12.7 cm/40 Type 89 dual-purpose guns
8 × triple Type 96 25 mm (0.98 in) AA guns
